article.title: Silicon Graphics Receives Two Supercomputing Task Orders
article.text: Silicon Graphics Federal LLC, Annapolis Junction, Maryland, was awarded a $17,646,418 modification (P0006) to contract W912DY-13-G-0025 for Department of Defense high performance-computing modernization program purchase of high-performance computing systems, administration and maintenance. The company also was awarded an $8,913,082 modification (P0007). Work will be performed in Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, with an estimated completion date of April 24, 2021.Â Fiscal 2016 other procurement (Army) funds in the amount of $17,646,418 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Corps of Engineers, Huntsville, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
